name: Crazy Catchy Combos
description:
Note: USE THE WINDOWS VERSION if you want it to work good lol :P

Crazy Catchy Combos (say that 10 times fast) is a game where you first listen to a randomly pieced-together set of music, and then you try and recreate it from memory! I made 18 different loops for 6 different instruments, and it was a whole lot of fun! There's really not much else to it! :D
